research

My research background is in algebraic geometry. In particular, I focus on polynomial interpolation type problems. See here for my research statement.

Publications & preprints

  1. Calvo, S., 2024. The icosahedral line configuration and Waldschmidt constants. Journal of Pure and Applied Algebra, 228(6), p.107563. pdf arXiv:2209.01499

Expository writing

Projective Monoid Schemes and Extended Fans TCNJ Honors Thesis. 2019.
Turning Angles on Convex Ideal Hyperbolic Polyhedra UC Berkeley REU Paper. 2018.
Differential equations notes Techniques on how to solve linear and second order differential equations.
Moduli Space notes Introduction to moduli space and marked curves. Algebraic geometry final paper.
Covering space notes Introduction to topology/covering spaces. Senior Capstone Paper.
